/2020/05/31/us/george-floyd-protests-live-updates.html,"Mayors Call for ‘Peace, Not Patience’The fury that had seized Minneapolis, where the death of George Floyd at the hands of the police set off days of protests, has swept across the country.At least 75 cities have seen protests in recent days, and the number of mayors and governors imposing curfews continued to grow.Officials in several states reinforced their National Guard presence as anger grew at increasingly aggressive tactics by the police. Here’s the latest.",,20200601-0000
